Package com.stormpath.sdk.directory

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AccountCreationPolicy
    A AccountCreationPolicy resource is used to configure different aspects and actions relevant to the Account-creation process.
    AccountStore  
    AccountStoreOptions<T>
    Options that may be specified when retrieving Directory or Application resources.
    AccountStoreVisitor  
    CreateDirectoryRequest  
    CreateDirectoryRequestBuilder
    A Builder to construct CreateDirectoryRequests.
    CustomData
    A CustomData is a Map resource within an Account or a Group, that allows you to specify whatever name/value pairs you wish.
    Directory
    A Directory is a top-level container of Accounts and Groups.
    DirectoryCriteria
    An Directory-specific Criteria class, enabling a Directory-specific fluentquery DSL.
    DirectoryList
    A CollectionResource containing Directory instances.
    DirectoryOptions<T extends DirectoryOptions>
    Directory-specific options that may be specified when retrieving Directory resources.
    PasswordPolicy
    A PasswordPolicy resource is used to configure different aspects of the restrictions on passwords for accounts associated with the parent Directory.
    PasswordStrength
    PasswordStrength is the resource used to configure the password strength policy.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Directories
    Static utility/helper methods for working with Directory resources.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DirectoryStatus
